title: Aqours’ Live 1st Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>We have a live today—!!! I can’t wait to meet everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You’re raring to go, aren’t you, Chika-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>She’s been so fidgety and restless since yesterday.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>You say that, but you practiced your MC all day yesterday zura, Yoshiko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>H-, hey, Zuramaru! You didn’t need to mention that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Practice is the key to everything, Yoshiko-san! I have to make the live more exciting with a perfect MC!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby and Onee-chan practiced a lot at home too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Mari also got a bunch of things perfect for the live~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Me too! I ran a bunch of simulations in my head!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu, it looks like everyone is really looking forward to it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
